DigiCam recommendations?

2006-02-20

I'm looking for my (first non-phone) digital camera now, and I've narrowed it down to these five (Kodak EasyShare V530, Kodak EasyShare V550, Samsung Digimax L50, Casio Exilim EX-S500, Casio Exilim EX-Z750). Does anybody have any recommendations for or against those or for a different one like those? I guess I want something that's ~$200-350, >3MP, SD media, decent video, and pocketable.
